Maven Project Info Reports Plugin version 3.4.2 - released

Jan 14, 2023 â€¢ {"display_name"=>"Karl-Heinz Marbaise", "login"=>"khmarbaise", "email"=>"khmarbaise@apache.org"}

The Apache Maven team is pleased to announce the release of the
Maven Project Info Reports Plugin version 3.4.2

You should specify the version in your project's plugin configuration:

1
2  org.apache.maven.plugins
3  maven-project-info-reports-plugin
4  3.4.2
5

You can download the appropriate sources etc. from the
download page.

Release Notes - Maven Project Info Reports Plugin - Version 3.4.2

  • Bug

    • MPIR-425 - Verbatim content should be rendered as plain text

  • Tasks

    • MPIR-426 - Remove Apache Buildr from Dependency Information Report
    • MPIR-427 - Explicitly start and end tables with Doxia Sinks in report renderers

Enjoy,

-The Apache Maven team
